title: Submit a Purchase Offer
description: A buyer wants to make an offer on a property. The agent must draft and submit the offer package.

tasks.description: Gather offer details from the buyer: price, contingencies (inspection, financing), and desired closing date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary terms for the offer.

tasks.description: Generate the official purchase agreement and other required documents (e.g., proof of funds).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete and accurate offer package.

tasks.description: Send the offer package to the listing agent and confirm receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the offer and logs the submission time.
